task.title: Fresh Strawberry Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: Although there's classics like the regular vanilla ice cream, it is always great to change things up a bit and add a little extra flavor into the mix. The fresh strawberry ice cream recipe can add that flavor for you.

taskbody.context:
The following information shows the materials needed to make the recipe and the steps necessary to create fresh strawberry ice cream using the ice cream machine.
1 ½ cups fresh strawberries
¾ cup whole milk
2/3 cup granulated sugar
Pinch kosher salt
1 ½ cups heavy cream
1 ½ teaspoons pure vanilla extract

step.cmd: Using a food processor fitted with a chopping blade, chop the strawberries until rough or finely chopped. The preference is yours.
Grab the mixing bowl and add the sugar.
Add the milk, sugar, salt, and whisk until the sugar is dissolved.
Add in the heavy cream and vanilla then continue mixing.
Add in the strawberries with the juies included.
After you finish mixing all of the ingridients, cover the bowl with plastic wrap, and refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours.
After the mixture has been refrigerated for 2 hours take it out and mix it again. Press the start/stop button on the machine.
Pour the mixture through the spout and continue mixing until the mix has thickened.
Transfer mixture into airtight container and place in freezer for 2 hours and remove from the freezer 15 minutes before serving.
